txt.en: 'Excellent work my friend. Let's see how it stands up to the Weaponsmith's Guild Leader's axe.'
'Do you have mail for me? Hah! Do you get it? Mail?'
The leader of the Metalsmith's Guild has now asked you to make some plate armour to show the apprentices.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nForge a guild-pattern breastplate.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern breastplate
'Next I want you to make some plate armour. A chest piece. Something that can stand up to the Orcs' wicked weapons.'
'Do you have mail for me? Hah! Do you get it? Mail?'
Executed the recipe for a guild-pattern breastplate
'Next I want you to make some plate armour. A chest piece. Something that can stand up to the Orcs' wicked weapons.'
Turn in a guild-pattern breastplate ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Hávar
'Excellent work my friend. Let's see how it stands up to the Weaponsmith's Guild Leader's axe.'
Talk to the Metalsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern breastplate ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Metalsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
